mapper.select: SELECT * FROM dc_order WHERE del_flag = 0 AND order_date = CURDATE() AND combo_id IN ( SELECT combo_id FROM dc_order o WHERE o.del_flag = 0 AND o.order_date = CURDATE() AND o.status != 2 GROUP BY combo_id HAVING COUNT(id) < #{minOrder} )

SELECT c.*,IFNULL(t.cnt,0) as cnt,IFNULL(t.avg,0) as avg FROM dc_combo c LEFT JOIN (SELECT o.combo_id,count(*) as cnt,AVG(eve_score) as avg FROM dc_order o WHERE o.del_flag = 0 AND o.status != 2 AND o.eve_score is not null AND o.order_date >= #{startDate} AND o.order_date <= #{endDate} GROUP BY o.combo_id ) t ON c.id = t.combo_id order by t.avg desc, t.cnt desc
select o.user_id,o.user_name,count(o.eve_score) as cnt from dc_order o WHERE o.del_flag = 0 AND o.status != 2 AND o.eve_score is not null GROUP BY o.user_id, o.user_name

select o.* FROM dc_order o ,(select DISTINCT(cg.combo_id) as combo_id FROM dc_combo_goods cg WHERE cg.goods_id = '5') t where t.combo_id = o.combo_id AND o.del_flag = 0 AND o.status = 0 AND o.eve_score is not null
